version_description:
- Full iPad compatibility!
- Optimized app storage. The app will use much less space on your devices now!
- Improved iPhone X support.
- Other minor bug fixes and tweaks.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on Facebook/Twitter.

- Never play alone!
Platobot has retired from playing games since he is tired of losing. Join a Room if you need someone to play with :)

- Removed the 3 game limit from Rooms, you can now play as many games as you want
- Fix an issue could cause app to crash on iPad for some users.
- Fix an issue causing some user not receiving push notifications about messages and game moves

Recent updates
- Full iPad compatibility!
- Optimized app storage. The app will use much less space on your devices now!
- Improved iPhone X support.
- Other minor bug fixes and tweaks.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on Facebook/Twitter.

Fixed an issue that could cause the app to crash due to a bug in iOS 11.

Recent updates
- Never play alone!
Platobot has retired from playing games since he is tired of losing. Join a Room if you need someone to play with :)
- Removed the 3 game limit from Rooms, you can now play as many games as you want
- Fix an issue could cause app to crash on iPad for some users.
- Fix an issue causing some user not receiving push notifications about messages and game moves
- Full iPad compatibility!
- Optimized app storage. The app will use much less space on your devices now!
- Improved iPhone X support.
- Other minor bug fixes and tweaks.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on Facebook/Twitter.

Fixed an issue related to enabling push notifications

- Fixed an issue related to enabling push notifications
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- New Games: Dominoes & Rock Card (like Cards Against Humanity)
- Fixed an issue that stopped some people from enabling push notifications

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on Facebook/Twitter.

- New Games: Dominoes & Rock Card (like Cards Against Humanity)
- Fixed some bugs and made things faster!

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on Facebook/Twitter.

- New Feature: Levels! Complete games for XP, unlock titles, and strive to reach level 20 for all your favorite games.
- Fixed some bugs and made things faster.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on Facebook/Twitter.

- New Feature: Levels! Complete games for XP, unlock titles, and strive to reach level 20 for all your favorite games.
- Fixed some bugs and made things faster.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on Facebook/Twitter.

- Fix performance issue in werewolf game

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on your favorite social network.

- Fix performance issue in werewolf game

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on your favorite social network.

- Shhhh: Blocking a person will now mute them in Rooms and Group Games.
- Bye, Felicia: You'll no longer be matched in ranked games with people you've blocked.
- New Game: Table Soccer! The world's most popular sport is now available on Plato.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on your favorite social network.

- Shhhh: Blocking a person will now mute them in Rooms and Group Games.
- Bye, Felicia: You'll no longer be matched in ranked games with people you've blocked.
- New Game: Table Soccer! The world's most popular sport is now available on Plato.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on your favorite social network.

- Game invites have moved over a tab inside Rooms to make it easier to chat. Tap over a tab to find open games.
- Wait a day: Added a notification if you've tried to change your profile picture too frequently.
- Shhhh: Blocking a person will now mute them in Rooms and Group Games.
- Bye, Felicia: You'll no longer be matched in ranked games with people you've blocked.
- New Game: Table Soccer! The world's most popular sport is now available on Plato.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on your favorite social network.

- Fixed an issue that could cause you to be a game observer even if there was a free seat in a game.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on your favorite social network.

- Support for Arabic, Indonesian & Thai languages in settings (Profile -> Gear Icon -> Languages).
- Private groups now show a list of who else is in the group.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on your favorite social network.

- Support for Arabic, Indonesian & Thai languages in settings (Profile -> Gear Icon -> Languages).
- Private groups now show a list of who else is in the group.

Your support means everything to us! Please drop us a note at hello@platoapp.com or @platochat on your favorite social network.
- Added the option to permanently delete your account.

- Added the option to permanently delete your account.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

-Easy switch: Use the new Preferred Language selector to get matched with other people that use your same language and to determine which Rooms you see.
-No more lost accounts: Added automatic account backup.

- Easy switch: Use the new Preferred Language selector to get matched with other people that use your same language and to determine which Rooms you see.
- No more lost accounts: Added automatic account backup.
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Bug fixes and improvements

New Games: Baloot (بلوت) & Bankroll (like Monopoly).
Improved: In-app notifications have been tweaked to be better.
Fixed: Issues with friends list and joining games on weak connections.
This version introduces more ways to customize Plato with Chat Bubbles!

This version sets us up for lots of new features in the future. Please update when you can.
- Bug fix and stability improvements

If you are using iOS 9, please consider upgrading to iOS 10 or later for better performance.

This version sets us up for lots of new features in the future. Please update when you can.

- Introducing Favorites: Hit the heart on any person, game, or group inside Plato and it will show up pinned to your home tab.
- Bug fix and stability improvements

If you are using iOS 9, please consider upgrading to iOS 10 or later for better performance.

- Bug fixes

If you are using iOS 9, please consider upgrading to iOS 10 or later for better performance.

New: Localizations for Spanish, Malay, French & Vietnamese
Improved: Only showing your preferred language ranked queues
Fixed: Friends list showing ?? instead of your friends' names
- Bug fixes.

New: Fresh new design & icon! Plato is now revamped to make everything cleaner. (Even PlatoBot got a makeover.)

Improved: Even more ways to connect & chat! Join a room and talk about your favorite TV shows, movies and music. Plus, we’ve redesigned the friends list for easier navigation. It now separate out requests from actual friends and makes it easier to invite people you know to Plato.

Fixed: Some display issues for translations.
Fixed: Long load times affecting some power users.
Fixed: A bug that stopped you from being able to add friends with 12 character Plato IDs and could cause some slow downs.
-More bug fixes and app performance improvements.

Improved: Better ongoing optimization of the home screen to speed up the app.
Fixed: A number of crashes and issues that could cause slow downs. Also, an issue that could cause the friends list to appear empty.
Bug fixes and improvements
-Fixed: An issue that could cause a perpetual "Connecting to Server" error.
-Fixed: An issue that caused turn-based games like Literati to disappear from the chat view unexpectedly.
-Fixed: An issue that caused turn-based games like Literati to disappear from the chat view unexpectedly.
- Bug fixes and improvements
New: Groups 2.0 - We've taken everything you love about public Rooms and applied it to private Groups. See Plato News in-app for more details.
-Fixed & Improved: A number of things for Groups 2.0.
-Fixed & Improved: A number of things for Groups 2.0.
- Bug fixes.
- Bug fixes.
New: Play Conspiracy with your friends!
Hold'em makes its return to Plato along with some other fixes and improvements for Groups and Rooms.

-Fixes an issue that could cause the home screen to lag
-Fixes an issue where another user's Plato ID could show up incorrectly
-Other fixes and improvements for Groups and Rooms including being able to see who was promoted or just joined your group

-Improved: Overall responsiveness, especially on older devices.
-New: Support for Brazilian Portuguese.
- Bug fixes

This version sets us up for lots of new features in the future. Please update when you can.

-Added back the Rematch option for the original match creator.
-Implemented better AI to handle annoying or unpleasant users.
-Improved the experience of joining a Group for the first time.
-Fixed a sorting issue for home screen messages.
-Fixed various places in the app that would encounter random lag.

This version sets us up for lots of new features in the future. Please update when you can.
- Added back the Rematch option for the original match creator.
- Implemented better AI to handle annoying or unpleasant users.
- Improved the experience of joining a Group for the first time.
- Fixed a sorting issue for home screen messages.
- Fixed various places in the app that would encounter random lag.

If you are using iOS 9, please consider upgrading to iOS 10 for better performance.

This version sets us up for lots of new features in the future. Please update when you can.

- Introducing Favorites: Hit the heart on any person, game, or group inside Plato and it will show up pinned to your home tab.
- Fixed a bug causing crash for some users while playing Dungeon Tales
- Other stability improvements

Profile Stats! Now you can see your total number of friends, wins, and gifts received on your profile.

We also fixed an issue where you might see an old Plato ID for another user instead of their current one.
